selectPit(int) - Method in interface MancalaModel
Tells the model that the player has selected the given pit for their turn.

Sets the boards current turn status to the given player.

Sets whether or not this pit is currently highlighted by a valid player
setInitialStoneCount(int) - Method in interface MancalaModel
Sets the amount of stones to be used for the game when it is first started, this will be called by the controller.
setInitialStoneCount(int) - Method in class Model
 
setMancala(boolean) - Method in class MancalaPitPanel
Sets whether or not this panel is a mancala pit

Sets the owner of this panel

setY(int) - Method in class MancalaPitPanel

startGame() - Method in interface MancalaModel
When this is ran the game is started over using the current settings in the model.

STONE_HEIGHT - Static variable in class MancalaPitPanel
Height of a Stone in the pit
STONE_WIDTH - Static variable in class MancalaPitPanel
Width of a Stone in the pit
StoneLayout - Interface in <Unnamed>
The stone layout interfaces describes a strategy for ordering a given amount of stones in an organized matter based on the amount of stones to be ordered, so that they can be drawn nicely inside of a pit.
